original_text: So Solomon did what was evil in the sight of the Lord and did not wholly follow the Lord, as David his father had done.
korean_text: 솔로몬이 여호와의 눈앞에서 악을 행하여 그의 아버지 다윗이 여호와를 온전히 따름 같이 따르지 아니하고

sentences.original_text: So Solomon did what was evil in the sight of the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 솔로몬은 주님 보시기에 악한 일을 했습니다

sentences.original_text: and did not wholly follow the Lord
as David his father had done.
